text: 13:2 Aposel 9:15; Rom 10:15; Galesia 1:15; Efesus 3:7-8; 1 Timoti 2:7; Hibru 5:4Ezɨ dughiar mamɨn Kraisɨn adarasi, me Godɨn apengan ikia uari isa God ganɨga, God ko mɨkɨmasa dagheba ta. Ezɨ Godɨn Duam kamaghɨn me mɨgei, “Kɨ Barnabas ko Sol uan ingangarim bagha aningɨn dia. Ia ingangarir kam bagh aning amɨseveghtɨ, aning nan ingangarim bagh mangɨ.”
